name: back-end
description: | Method |   Endpoint    |                                                                                                                         Description | | ------ | :-----------: | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------: | | Post   | /api/register | Creates a user using the information sent inside the body of the request. Hash the password before saving the user to the database. | | Post   |  /api/login   |                                                                 Gets the username and password from the body for login credentials. |
